column4: Hello could someone help me take a look at my dovecot/postfix problem?
I keep getting postfix/smtpd[3140]: warning: SASL: Connect to private/auth failed: Connection refused
Jun 22 10:50:28 sol postfix/smtpd[3140]: fatal: no SASL authentication mechanisms
do you have any setting that might drop packets?
my server was working fine until the update last week, incoming works fine, outgoing also using my webmail, but not with a client to send outgoing on the submission port
ok, we'll try to isolate the problem, in your config set ssl to no, try again if it works then we'll know nothing else is dropping packets and the problem is in ssl/tls
yea, just tested, now I can't receive email
oh wait it was pre-change. i withdraw my profantiy
got that last error solved, renamed the conf file it was looking for
